snippet: Federal officials are conducting an investigation after the Mexican government said a Mexican citizen was killed when an agent patrolling the Rio Grande fired across the border.
abstract: Federal officials are investigating information from Mexican government that a Mexican citizen was killed when a US Border Patrol agent patrolling the Rio Grande fired across the border; Border Patrol confirms that shots were fired but says it is not clear that anyone was hit by the bullets.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials are conducting an investigation after the Mexican government said a Mexican citizen was killed when an agent patrolling the Rio Grande fired across the border.
